verses.text:
Then \w sang|strong="H7891"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, for he hath \w triumphed|strong="H1342"\w* \w gloriously|strong="H1342"\w*: the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* and his \w rider|strong="H7392"\w* hath he \w thrown|strong="H7411"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and \w song|strong="H2176"\w*, and he is become my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: \w he|strong="H2088"\w* \add is\add* my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and I will prepare him an \w habitation|strong="H5115"\w*; my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and I will \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* him.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* and his \w host|strong="H2428"\w* hath he \w cast|strong="H3384"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: his \w chosen|strong="H4005"\w* \w captains|strong="H7991"\w* also are \w drowned|strong="H2883"\w* in the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.
The \w depths|strong="H8415"\w* have \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* them: they \w sank|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w bottom|strong="H4688"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

Thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, is become \w glorious|strong="H0142"\w* in \w power|strong="H3581"\w*: thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, hath dashed in \w pieces|strong="H7492"\w* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

And in the \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* of thine \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w* thou hast \w overthrown|strong="H2040"\w* them that rose up \w against|strong="H6965"\w* thee: thou sentest \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w*, \add which\add* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* them as \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*.

And with the \w blast|strong="H7307"\w* of thy \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H6192"\w*, the \w floods|strong="H5140"\w* stood \w upright|strong="H5324"\w* as an \w heap|strong="H5067"\w*, \add and\add* the \w depths|strong="H8415"\w* were \w congealed|strong="H7087"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

The \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w*, I will \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w*, I will \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*; my \w lust|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w satisfied|strong="H4390"\w* upon them; I will \w draw|strong="H7324"\w* my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H3423"\w* them.\f + \fr 15.9 \ft destroy: or, repossess\f*

Thou didst \w blow|strong="H5398"\w* with thy \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* them: they \w sank|strong="H6749"\w* as \w lead|strong="H5777"\w* in the \w mighty|strong="H0117"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

Who \add is\add* like unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, among the \w gods|strong="H0410"\w*? who \add is\add* like thee, \w glorious|strong="H0142"\w* in \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*, \w fearful|strong="H3372"\w* \add in\add* \w praises|strong="H8416"\w*, \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w*?\f + \fr 15.11 \ft gods: or, mighty ones?\f*
Thou stretchedst \w out|strong="H5186"\w* thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* them.

Thou in thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* hast led \w forth|strong="H5148"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add  \+w which|strong="H2098"\+w*\add* thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w*: thou hast \w guided|strong="H5095"\w* \add them\add* in thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* unto thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w*.

The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \add and\add* be \w afraid|strong="H7264"\w*: \w sorrow|strong="H2427"\w* shall take \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* on the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Palestina|strong="H6429"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* the \w dukes|strong="H0441"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* shall be \w amazed|strong="H0926"\w*; the mighty \w men|strong="H0352"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w trembling|strong="H7461"\w* shall take \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* upon them; all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* shall melt \w away|strong="H4127"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H0367"\w* and \w dread|strong="H6343"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon them; by the \w greatness|strong="H1419"\w* of thine \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* they shall be \add as\add* \w still|strong="H1826"\w* as a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*; till thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, till the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, \add  \+w which|strong="H2098"\+w*\add* thou hast \w purchased|strong="H7069"\w*.

Thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them in, and \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* them in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \add in\add* the \w place|strong="H4349"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add which\add* thou hast \w made|strong="H6466"\w* for thee to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*, \add in\add* the \w Sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \add which\add* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* have \w established|strong="H3559"\w*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

For the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* with his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and with his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* brought \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* upon them; but the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* on \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \add land\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

¶ And \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* the \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*, the \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w timbrel|strong="H8596"\w* in her \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and all the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* her with \w timbrels|strong="H8596"\w* and with \w dances|strong="H4246"\w*.

And \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* them, \w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* ye to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for he hath \w triumphed|strong="H1342"\w* \w gloriously|strong="H1342"\w*; the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* and his \w rider|strong="H7392"\w* hath he \w thrown|strong="H7411"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

So \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H5265"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Shur|strong="H7793"\w*; and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

¶ And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Marah|strong="H4785"\w*, they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Marah|strong="H4785"\w*, for they \add were\add* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w*: therefore the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of it was \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Marah|strong="H4785"\w*.\f + \fr 15.23 \ft Marah: that is Bitterness\f*
And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall we \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*?

And he \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w shewed|strong="H3384"\w* him a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \add which\add* when he had \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* into the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* were made \w sweet|strong="H4985"\w*: there he \w made|strong="H7760"\w* for them a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* and an \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w*, and there he \w proved|strong="H5254"\w* them,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou wilt \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and wilt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in his \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, and wilt give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* to his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, I will \w put|strong="H7760"\w* none of these \w diseases|strong="H4245"\w* upon thee, which I have \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* upon the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*: for I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that \w healeth|strong="H7495"\w* thee.

¶ And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Elim|strong="H0362"\w*, where \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w wells|strong="H5869"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* palm \w trees|strong="H8558"\w*: and they \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* there by the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.
